text: "Mack the Knife" or "The Ballad of Mack the Knife" () is a song composed by Kurt Weill for the 1928 play The Threepenny Opera. The song has become a popular standard recorded by many artists including Louis Armstrong in 1955, Bobby Darin in 1959 and Ella Fitzgerald Grammy Award winning in 1961. ==References== Category:1920s songs Category:Ballads Category:Louis Armstrong songs Category:Bobby Darin songs Category:Ella Fitzgerald songs Category:Frank Sinatra songs Category:Nick Cave songs Category:Jimmy Buffett songs Category:Sting (musician) songs Category:Tony Bennett songs Category:Bing Crosby songs Category:Bill Haley songs Category:Westlife songs Category:Michael Bubl√© songs Category:Robbie Williams songs Category:Dr. John songs Category:Jazz standards Category:1928 works Category:1955 songs Category:1959 songs
title: Mack the Knife
